I recently completed my Ph.D. in applied mathematics at UCLA where I was extremely fortunate to be advised by Deanna Needell. This year, I am postdoc in the computer science department at CMU under the supervision of David Woodruff. Previously I completed my undergrad degrees at UT Austin in mathematics and computer science.
